Leslie's Music

This page includes my musical interests. Although still in construction due to a lack of musical perfection (and obsession for it), here is a sample of my music.

Compositions

Exultate, Jubilate. (Renaissance counterpoint in transposed Ionian (F major), 3v. Project for TH251, Counterpoint I)

Gavotte. (2-part Baroque counterpoint for the keyboard. Project for TH252, Tonal Counterpoint)

Fugue. (3-part Baroque counterpoint for the keyboard. Project for TH252, Tonal Counterpoint) Note: here is a midi-generated harpsichord recording.

Performance

Piano:

Sinfonia No. 15 in B minor, by J. S. Bach. (December, 2017)
